attributes.name: Party Planner
attributes.summary:
## Overview
Create a comprehensive Party Planner card for event organization and celebration management in the Boxel framework. This card should help users plan, coordinate, and execute memorable parties and celebrations with detailed guest management, vendor coordination, budget tracking, and timeline organization for successful events.

## Core Fields

### Event Information
- **eventTitle**: StringField - Party or celebration name
- **eventType**: StringField with enum: "birthday", "wedding", "anniversary", "graduation", "holiday", "corporate", "housewarming", "baby-shower", "retirement"
- **eventDate**: DateField - Celebration date
- **startTime**: TimeField - Party start time
- **endTime**: TimeField - Expected end time
- **duration**: NumberField - Event length in hours (computed)
- **eventStatus**: StringField with enum: "planning", "confirmed", "in-progress", "completed", "cancelled", "postponed"
- **theme**: StringField - Party theme or style
- **dresscode**: StringField - Attire requirements

### Venue & Location
- **venue**: StringField - Location name
- **venueType**: StringField with enum: "home", "restaurant", "hall", "outdoor", "hotel", "club", "park", "beach"
- **address**: contains(Address) - Complete venue address
- **capacity**: NumberField - Maximum guest count
- **venueContact**: contains(ContactInfo) - Venue coordinator details
- **rentalCost**: NumberField - Venue rental fee
- **deposit**: NumberField - Required deposit amount
- **setupTime**: TimeField - When setup begins
- **cleanupTime**: TimeField - When cleanup ends

### Guest Management
- **guestList**: containsMany(Guest) - All invited guests
- **expectedAttendees**: NumberField - Estimated guest count
- **confirmedAttendees**: NumberField - RSVP confirmed count
- **childrenCount**: NumberField - Kids attending
- **dietaryRestrictions**: containsMany(DietaryNeed) - Food allergies/preferences
- **invitations**: contains(InvitationDetails) - Invitation design and delivery
- **rsvpDeadline**: DateField - Response deadline
- **guestCategories**: containsMany(GuestCategory) - Family, friends, colleagues

### Budget Management
- **totalBudget**: NumberField - Overall party budget
- **budgetBreakdown**: contains(BudgetCategories) - Category allocations
- **actualSpending**: NumberField - Money spent so far
- **remainingBudget**: NumberField - Budget left (computed)
- **expenses**: containsMany(Expense) - All party expenses
- **costPerGuest**: NumberField - Per-person cost (computed)
- **contingencyFund**: NumberField - Emergency budget buffer
- **paymentSchedule**: containsMany(Payment) - Vendor payment timeline

### Food & Beverage
- **cateringType**: StringField with enum: "self-catered", "restaurant", "caterer", "potluck", "food-truck"
- **menu**: contains(MenuPlanning) - Food and drink selections
- **caterer**: contains(VendorInfo) - Catering company details
- **alcoholPolicy**: StringField - Alcohol service decisions
- **bartender**: contains(VendorInfo) - Bar service provider
- **cake**: contains(CakeDetails) - Birthday/celebration cake
- **servingware**: containsMany(ServingItem) - Plates, utensils, linens
- **specialDiets**: containsMany(SpecialMenu) - Vegan, gluten-free options

### Entertainment & Activities
- **entertainment**: containsMany(Entertainment) - DJ, band, performers
- **activities**: containsMany(Activity) - Games and planned activities
- **music**: contains(MusicPlanning) - Playlist and sound system
- **photography**: contains(PhotographyService) - Professional photos
- **decorations**: containsMany(Decoration) - Theme decorations
- **specialFeatures**: containsMany(SpecialFeature) - Photo booth, lighting
- **kidsActivities**: containsMany(KidsActivity) - Child entertainment

### Vendor Management
- **vendors**: containsMany(Vendor) - All service providers
- **contracts**: containsMany(Contract) - Vendor agreements
- **payments**: containsMany(VendorPayment) - Payment tracking
- **deliverySchedule**: containsMany(Delivery) - Vendor arrival times
- **vendorContacts**: containsMany(VendorContact) - Emergency contacts
- **backupVendors**: containsMany(BackupVendor) - Alternative options
- **vendorReviews**: containsMany(VendorReview) - Post-event feedback

### Timeline & Coordination
- **planningTimeline**: containsMany(PlanningMilestone) - Preparation schedule
- **dayOfSchedule**: containsMany(EventTimeBlock) - Party day timeline
- **setupTasks**: containsMany(SetupTask) - Pre-party preparation
- **cleanupPlan**: contains(CleanupSchedule) - Post-party cleanup
- **emergencyContacts**: containsMany(EmergencyContact) - Important numbers
- **weatherBackup**: contains(WeatherPlan) - Indoor/outdoor alternatives

### Supplies & Shopping
- **shoppingList**: containsMany(ShoppingItem) - Items to purchase
- **decorations**: containsMany(DecorationItem) - Theme decorations
- **supplies**: containsMany(PartySupply) - Plates, napkins, cups
- **rentalItems**: containsMany(RentalItem) - Tables, chairs, linens
- **partyFavors**: containsMany(PartyFavor) - Guest giveaways
- **giftBags**: contains(GiftBagPlanning) - Thank you gifts

## Required Component Cards

### Guest Card
Create a separate Guest card with:
- **guestName**: StringField - Full name
- **relationship**: StringField - Friend, family, colleague
- **contactInfo**: contains(ContactDetails) - Phone, email
- **invitationStatus**: StringField - Sent, delivered, opened
- **rsvpStatus**: StringField - Pending, yes, no, maybe
- **rsvpDate**: DateField - When they responded
- **guestCount**: NumberField - How many people they're bringing
- **dietaryNeeds**: StringField - Food restrictions
- **giftReceived**: BooleanField - Did they bring a gift
- **attendance**: BooleanField - Did they actually attend

### Vendor Card
- **vendorName**: StringField - Business name
- **serviceType**: StringField - Catering, entertainment, decoration
- **contactPerson**: StringField - Primary contact
- **phoneNumber**: StringField - Business phone
- **email**: EmailField - Business email
- **website**: URLField - Company website
- **quotedPrice**: NumberField - Initial price quote
- **finalPrice**: NumberField - Actual cost
- **depositRequired**: NumberField - Upfront payment
- **paymentTerms**: StringField - Payment schedule
- **contractSigned**: BooleanField - Agreement status
- **insuranceInfo**: StringField - Liability coverage
- **cancellationPolicy**: MarkdownField - Cancellation terms
- **rating**: NumberField - Vendor quality rating 1-5

### Expense Card
- **expenseDate**: DateField - Purchase date
- **category**: StringField - Food, decorations, entertainment
- **vendor**: linksTo(Vendor) - Who was paid
- **description**: StringField - What was purchased
- **amount**: NumberField - Cost
- **paymentMethod**: StringField - Cash, credit, check
- **receipt**: contains(ImageField) - Receipt photo
- **budgetCategory**: StringField - Which budget line item
- **isDeposit**: BooleanField - Partial payment
- **notes**: StringField - Additional expense details

## Computed Fields Logic

### Budget Utilization
Calculate percentage of budget spent across all categories.

### Cost Per Guest
Total expenses divided by confirmed attendee count.

### RSVP Response Rate
Percentage of guests who have responded to invitations.

### Timeline Progress
Track completion of planning milestones leading up to event.

## Card Layout Design

### Isolated/Embedded View Layout
Design a celebration-focused planning interface:

**Header Section**
- Event title and theme prominently displayed
- Party date and countdown timer
- Guest count and RSVP status
- Budget overview with spending progress
- Quick action buttons (Send Invites, Add Vendor)

**Navigation Tabs**
- **Overview**: Event summary and key details
- **Guests**: Invitation and RSVP management
- **Budget**: Financial planning and expense tracking
- **Vendors**: Service provider coordination
- **Timeline**: Planning schedule and day-of events
- **Shopping**: Supply lists and purchase tracking

**Party Dashboard**
- **Quick Stats**:
  - Days until party
  - RSVP response rate
  - Budget spent vs. remaining
  - Vendor contracts signed
  - Shopping list completion
  
- **Today's Tasks**:
  - Urgent to-do items
  - Vendor follow-ups needed
  - Shopping items to buy
  - Planning deadlines approaching

**Guest Management Center**
- RSVP tracking dashboard
- Invitation delivery status
- Guest list with contact info
- Dietary restriction summary
- Seating arrangement planner

**Budget Tracker**
- Category spending visualization
- Expense entry interface
- Vendor payment schedule
- Cost per guest calculator
- Budget alert system

**Vendor Coordination**
- Vendor contact information
- Contract status tracking
- Payment timeline
- Day-of arrival schedule
- Emergency contact list

### Timeline View
- Planning milestone tracker
- Day-of-event schedule
- Setup and cleanup timeline
- Vendor coordination schedule
- Critical path visualization

### Shopping List View
- Categorized supply lists
- Store-organized shopping
- Price comparison tools
- Purchase tracking
- Rental item coordination

## Interactive Features

### Smart Planning
- Party type templates
- Automatic timeline generation
- Budget allocation suggestions
- Vendor recommendation engine
- Guest list import from contacts

### Collaboration Tools
- Shared planning with co-hosts
- Task assignment features
- Real-time update notifications
- Comment and feedback system
- Role-based permissions

### Communication Hub
- Invitation design and sending
- RSVP collection and tracking
- Vendor communication log
- Guest update broadcasts
- Thank you note management

## Styling Requirements
- Celebration-themed design with festive colors
- Customizable themes for different party types
- Photo integration for inspiration and planning
- Print-friendly planning documents
- Mobile-optimized for day-of coordination
- Accessibility for all ages
- Multi-cultural celebration support
- Gender-neutral design options

## Validation Rules
- Party dates in the future
- Guest counts within venue capacity
- Budget allocations sum correctly
- RSVP deadlines before party date
- Vendor payment dates logical
- Contact information format validation
- Timeline milestones chronological
- Expense amounts positive

## Integration Points
- **Invitation Platforms**: Evite, Paperless Post, Canva
- **Vendor Directories**: Thumbtack, WeddingWire, Yelp
- **Contact Management**: Google Contacts, iPhone Contacts
- **Calendar Apps**: Google Calendar, Outlook, Apple Calendar
- **Payment Systems**: PayPal, Venmo, Zelle for vendor payments
- **Photo Sharing**: Google Photos, iCloud, Dropbox
- **Catering Services**: Local restaurant delivery platforms
- **Rental Companies**: Party supply rental businesses
- **Music Streaming**: Spotify, Apple Music for playlists
- **Weather Services**: AccuWeather for outdoor events

## Business Logic Requirements
- Intelligent vendor matching based on party type and budget
- Automatic timeline generation with customizable milestones
- Smart budget allocation recommendations
- RSVP tracking with automated reminders
- Vendor payment scheduling and tracking
- Guest dietary restriction aggregation
- Day-of coordination with real-time updates
- Post-party expense reconciliation
- Vendor performance rating and review system
- Party template creation from successful events
- Integration with local business directories
- Multi-currency support for international celebrations
- Weather monitoring for outdoor events
- Emergency contact and backup plan coordination
